CHAT.comment: GREEN TREE FINANCIAL CORP., NKA CONSECO FINANCE CORP., Petitioner v. LYNN W. BAZZLE, ETC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CORNELIA T.L. PILLARD ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:09 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
